title: Execute Function for Each List Element
description: In Python, it is common to need to execute a function for each element in a list. This can be done using a for loop, but it can be tedious to write out the loop every time. In this challenge, you will create a function that takes a list and a function as arguments and executes the function for each element in the list.

meta.title: Python | List Manipulation | Function Execution
meta.description: Learn how to execute a function for each element in a Python list using the for_each() function. Enhance your programming skills with this concise and effective tutorial.
